From: Mira Rouhana <mira.rouhana@fidelitygulf.com> 
Sent: Wednesday, August 27, 2025 9:55 AM
To: Nada Boutros <Nada.Boutros@chalhoub.com>
Subject: M/s Chalhoub Group - Fidelity Insurance Services LLC (Proposal)
Importance: High

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Ms. Boutros,

 

Please find attached a proposal prepared by Fidelity Insurance Services LLC outlining a potential strategic partnership and shareholding arrangement with Chalhoub Group.

 

The document sets out the rationale, mutual benefits, and next steps for exploring a partnership model that aligns both organizations through equity participation and consolidated insurance management. 

 

Given the shared values of our family-owned enterprises, we believe this framework offers a unique opportunity to create long-term value, transparency, and alignment.

 

We would be pleased to arrange a meeting at your convenience to discuss the proposal in more detail and address any questions you may have.

Thank you for your consideration, and we look forward to your feedback.

 

Warm Regards, 

       

Mira Achkar  |  Cert CII  |  Managing Partner

 + 971 4 388 8488     + 971 50 654 6155

 Fidelitygulf.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/IP6ACE6noUoZnqBsNf3s7aixn?domain=fidelitygulf.com/>        PO Box 25221 Dubai     DXB / SHJ / AUH
